value.title: Build AI solutions with Azure Machine Learning service
value.excerpt: Azure includes a variety of services for designing and deploying machine learning models. Learn how to leverage these services in your data analysis.

topItems.title: Introduction to the Azure Machine Learning SDK
topItems.excerpt: Azure Machine Learning provides a cloud-based platform for training, deploying, and managing machine learning models.

topItems.title: Train a machine learning model with Azure Machine Learning
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure Machine Learning to train a model and register it in a workspace.

topItems.title: Work with Data in Azure Machine Learning
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to work with datastores and datasets in Azure Machine Learning.

topItems.title: Work with Compute in Azure Machine Learning
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to manage compute contexts for experiments in Azure Machine Learning.

value.title: Build AI solutions with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Azure Machine Learning is a cloud platform for training, deploying, managing, and monitoring machine learning models. Learn how to use the Azure Machine Learning Python SDK to create enterprise-ready machine learning solutions.

topItems.title: Introduction to the Azure Machine Learning SDK

topItems.excerpt: Learn how to work with datastores and datasets in Azure Machine Learning.

topItems.title: Work with Compute in Azure Machine Learning
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to manage compute contexts for experiments in Azure Machine Learning.

value.title: Analyze costs and create budgets with Azure Cost Management
value.excerpt: Learn how to use cost analysis to understand how your costs accrue each month.

value.title: Improve the performance of an API by adding a caching policy in Azure API Management
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure API Management to change an API without rewriting code to enable you to apply a caching policy to a GET operation for quicker response.

value.title: Manage database changes in Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Use a release approval in Azure Pipelines to help coordinate database schema changes between developers and database administrators.

value.title: Control Azure spending and manage bills with Azure Cost Management and billing learning path
value.excerpt: Learn how to monitor and control your Azure spending and optimize the use of Azure resources.

topItems.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Cost optimization
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use the cost optimization pillar of the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework to design a cloud-based architecture that is efficient, eliminates waste, and gives you full visibility into where your money is spent on cloud resources.

topItems.title: Predict costs and optimize spending for Azure
topItems.excerpt: Discover how to use Azure pricing calculator, Azure Cost Management, and Azure Advisor to predict and manage cloud expenses.

topItems.title: Analyze costs and create budgets with Azure Cost Management
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use cost analysis to understand how your costs accrue each month.

topItems.title: Save money with Azure Reserved Instances
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use plan for, buy, and manage Azure reservations to save money.

value.title: Run nonfunctional tests in Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Run automated load tests by using Apache JMeter, a form of nonfunctional testing, in Azure Pipelines.

value.title: Define an AI strategy to create value in government
value.excerpt: Explore the strategic components, special factors, and use cases of an AI strategy in Government that creates value, with INSEAD and Microsoft.

value.excerpt: Run Selenium UI tests, a form of functional testing, in Azure Pipelines.

value.title: Protect your APIs on Azure API Management
value.excerpt: Protect your back-end APIs from information exposure and implement throttling to prevent resource exhaustion with policies in Azure API Management.

value.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value across industries
value.excerpt: In this learning path, you will hear from Peter Zemsky, INSEAD's Eli Lilly Chaired Professor of Strategy and Innovation, about how AI is driving business value across industries and companies as well as Microsoft customers and partners. You will be able to discuss how technical teams are bringing AI into business applications and how business leaders of different industries are thinking about AI for their own businesses.

topItems.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value
topItems.excerpt: Explore the strategic components, use cases, and special factors of an enterprise AI strategy that creates real business value, with INSEAD and Microsoft.

value.title: Deploy applications with Azure DevOps learning path
value.excerpt: Learn how to configure release pipelines that continuously build, test, and deploy your applications.

topItems.title: Create a release pipeline in Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Set up a continuous delivery (CD) pipeline that automates the process of deploying your application.

topItems.title: Create a multistage pipeline by using Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Design and create a realistic release pipeline that promotes changes to various testing and staging environments.

topItems.excerpt: Use a release approval in Azure Pipelines to help coordinate database schema changes between developers and database administrators.

topItems.excerpt: Run Selenium UI tests, a form of functional testing, in Azure Pipelines.

value.title: Architect API integration in Azure learning path
value.excerpt: Learn how to architect API integration in Azure, and provide secure, scalable API access for your applications.

topItems.title: Publish and manage your APIs with Azure API Management
topItems.excerpt: Learn about using an Azure API gateway to share APIs with partners, and how to use subscription keys to control access to your APIs.

topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure API Management to change an API without rewriting code to enable you to apply a caching policy to a GET operation for quicker response.

topItems.excerpt: Protect your back-end APIs from information exposure and implement throttling to prevent resource exhaustion with policies in Azure API Management.

topItems.excerpt: Discover how to protect your APIs from unauthorized use with API keys and client certificate authentication.

value.excerpt: Provide disaster recovery for your Azure infrastructure by managing and orchestrating replication, failover, and failback of Azure virtual machines with Azure Site Recovery.

value.excerpt: University of Oxford

value.title: Discover ways to foster an AI-ready culture in your business
value.excerpt: In this learning path, you will hear from top Microsoft executives about a framework to drive the key changes that are necessary to become an AI -ready organization. You will be able to identify the successful implementations of AI and articulate relevant scenarios. You will be able to discuss a line of business specific and relevant uses cases in finance, marketing, sales, and customer service. And finally, you will be able to identify  AI solutions to implement in your organization based upon its maturity.

topItems.title: Understand the importance of building an AI-ready culture
topItems.excerpt: Understand the key elements that make a culture AI-ready and a framework to drive the change needed in your organization for a successful AI strategy.

topItems.title: Discover how to foster an AI-ready culture in finance
topItems.excerpt: Learn the necessary cultural changes for enterprise finance organizations to make AI transformation successful, and how they fit into a holistic AI strategy.

topItems.title: Discover how to foster an AI-ready culture in marketing

topItems.title: Discover how to foster an AI-ready culture in sales

value.title: AI business school for education
value.excerpt: Decision-makers in education have considerations that are particular to their sector to help them realize the true transformational impact of AI in education. It is critical to understand the components of a strategy that will help the education sector create value with AI. This learning path is designed for education decision-makers to illustrate the true transformational impact of AI in education.

This learning path is designed for government decision-makers to illustrate the true transformational impact of AI in the public sector.
